page.title: 03The School at Digby.
page.content: Our school has three classrooms,a dining room,a staffroom,and a disused kitchen.It is in two parts,the old part which includes tne staffroom and Infant classroom and the new extension.The old part of the school was built over a hundred years ago. the new part was built twenty five years ago. There are three teachers and sixty eight children. Thirty six children come from Digby,twelve from Ashby,five from Rowston,twelve from Scopwick and three from Kirkby Green. Eleven children cycle to school,fourteen come by taxi,twelve come by coach,six come by car and twenty five walk.
